1112.title: Look deeper

12.content: You hear your door crack open and your neighbor yells wake up lazy bones we gotta make it on time to the factory he shakes you trying to get you out the bed he succeeds and he says
12.title: Your annoying Appartment neibor wakes you up

choices: "Dave, please leave my house and let me sleep in peace."
122.content:
"Come on Sera! We need to get to the factory pronto!" your neighbor says. You rub your eyes and you mutter while half asleep:
"God dammit Dave, it's five in the morning, can't you bother me with your crazy conspiracies later?" you ask.

Dave was very weird as far as neighbors go, but he was mostly harmless. This isn't the first time he's entered your house without your permission, you really have to start locking the front door. He was wearing his usual white shirt, and he still hadn't shaven his messy beard, he had bags under his eyes as per usual. However, this time his messy hair was covered by a stainless steel pot.

"Dave... what's the pot for?" you ask, still not fully awake.
"It's for protection! Quickly now, get dressed up we need to get to the factory before it's too late!" Dave answers, while peeking through the window covers.

what do you tell Dave?
122.title: Sera (Female)

info.brief_description: Your a normal Average joe in a in average world
info.description: You wake up slowly it's a grate summer day but you'd wish that was true as the blinding hot sunlight beams through the shades on this boring yet normal Monday morning
